mapper.select: select * from ( select e.ecno, e.ecname, t1.trno, t1.cno, t1.trname, t1.cname, t1.ccode, t1.ctotalnum, t1.cstartdate, t1.cenddate, t1.crequireddate, t1.cstatus, t1.cprofessor, t1.cmanager, t1.ccreatedat, t1.cupdatedat, t1.ctrainingdate, ctrainingtime, t1.trcapacity, t1.trenable from educenter e, ( select c.cno, r.ecno, r.trno, r.trname, c.cname, c.ccode, c.ctotalnum, c.cstartdate, c.cenddate, c.crequireddate, c.cstatus, c.cprofessor, c.cmanager, c.ccreatedat, c.cupdatedat, c.ctrainingdate, c.ctrainingtime, r.trcapacity, r.trenable from course c, trainingroom r where c.trno = r.trno ) t1 where e.ecno = t1.ecno ) where ecno=#{ecno} and cname=#{cname} and cstatus='진행예정' and cstatus='진행중'
